description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2oo73","text":"An immunohistochemistry (IHC) staining protocol for in situ identification of IgM in pig tissue. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":52,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"e9gtv","text":"Assay Controls:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dglru","text":"Here are a few controls you can use to ensure assay is working correctly:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c022g","text":"IHC controls:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9g8","text":"o  Negative control (primary antibody only)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6hkcg","text":"§ This slide receives 0.05% PBS-T in place of secondary antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dq6uq","text":"o  Negative control (secondary antibody only)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36mas","text":"§ This slide receives 1% BSA in PBS in place of diluted primary antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"961jn","text":"o  Batch control ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4augr","text":"§ If performing staining across multiple batches, include serial sections of one tissue in each batch that has positive staining for Salmonella\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1jmh","text":"Assay variations:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6tave","text":"Parameters for some steps (e.g. antibody incubations, antigen retrieval, chromogen incubations, counterstaining) may need to be further optimized for different tissues or targets. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"176te","text":"Before starting the assay: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fgu9","text":"Preheat a dry oven to 60℃ ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9c1n","text":"Load slides for assay into vertical slide rack","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dguuc","text":"\nBaking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":6},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":1,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"as009","text":"Bake slides 20 min 60℃","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3mcmd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68bm","text":"While slides bake:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ra63","text":"Prepare 0.05% PBS-T (can store at RT up to 1 month)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2eokn","text":"Immediately before deparaffinizing:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"msp2","text":"Add ~200 mL xylenes to each of three clearing agent dishes in a fume hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fa9ea","text":"Add ~200 mL 100% ethanol to each of two staining dishes in a fume hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rk7t","text":"Add ~200 mL 95% ethanol to a staining dish in a fume hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f4u7v","text":"Add ~200 mL 85% ethanol to a staining dish in a fume hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2nuns","text":"Add ~200 mL 70% ethanol to a staining dish in a fume hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1jb4","text":"Add ~200 mL distilled water to a staining dish in a fume hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56rpf","text":"Add ~200 mL PBS-T to a staining dish in a fume oven","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68tv9","text":"Prepare humidified slide staining tray by adding water to bottom \u0026 placing lid on top","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkn6n","text":"Add ~200 mL PBS-T to each of two staining dishes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6cfl3","text":"Hydrophobic Barrier","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hg3j","text":"Apply hydrophobic barrier around each tissue","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bs38b","text":"o  ----------One by one, unload slides from vertical rack submerged in PBS-T. Dry off only the area around the tissue where a barrier will be drawn with a hydrophobic barrier pen. Keep tissue area wet the whole time. Draw barrier and place slide flat in the slide staining tray. Using a pipette, apply a small amount of PBS-T within the barrier (just enough to keep the tissue wet while drawing barriers on remaining slides)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"82sht","text":"Leave slides in slide staining tray","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

sensitivity","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4pms","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cgqkh","text":"Chromogen slides and again place flat in slide staining tray","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9iu0p","text":"Incubate with diluted DAB chromogen 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1jac8","text":"o  ----------Pipette well to mix immediately before use; pipette appropriate volumes to completely cover tissues \u0026 let incubate in slide staining tray with lid closed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4851o","text":"Decant slides and transfer to vertical slide rack","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fl6rm","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ab6m","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dt9te","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f04t","text":"While slides are incubating with DAB chromogen:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fk2qa","text":"Discard secondary antibody reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ke0a","text":"Add ~200 mL PBS-T to each of two staining dishes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65lch","text":"Add ~200 mL 25% hematoxylin to one staining dish","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ds3rc","text":"o  ----------Prepare by combining 150 mL distilled water with 50 mL Gill’s Hematoxylin","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1t4tj","text":"Add ~200 mL distilled water to each of three staining dishes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dr61v","text":"Add ~200 mL 95% ethanol to a staining dish in a fume hood","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bigij","text":"Add ~200 mL 100% ethanol to each of three staining dishes in a fume hood","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cvafh","text":"Add ~200 mL Pro-Par to each of three clearing agent dishes in a fume hood","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"asd4u","text":"Counterstaining","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6d6t","text":"Submerge slide rack in diluted hematoxylin 15 sec RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":23,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"22jdo","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh distilled water, dunking 3-5 times","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"749ut","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh distilled water, dunking 3-5 times","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qjse","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh distilled water, dunking 3-5 times","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8uvhj","text":"Mounting","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6qdu","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 95% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4b3oh","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 100% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e5o","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 100% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4es37","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 100% ethanol 1 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8eu7o","text":"Submerge slides in fresh Pro-Par 5 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fro7v","text":"Submerge slides in fresh Pro-Par 5 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"18vfs","text":"Submerge slides in fresh Pro-Par 5 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c2osq","text":"Mount slides by adding 2-4 drops of mounting media to each slide, followed by application of a cover glass. Remove bubbles from tissue by applying pressure to cover glass","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dvepu","text":"Place slides flat in a dry, dark space to air dry at RT overnight","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atc2e","text":"Assess staining with a bright-field microscope","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ch9d4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vol5","text":"While slides are air drying:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f44rr","text":"Discard chromogen detection and counterstaining reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
